'''Ambrosial Essence''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] {{Wish Item|Emilie}} as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Lumidouce Elegy]], a weapon tailored to Emilie's gameplay mechanics.
